snippet.title: Betrayer: Curse Of The Spine [PC] Prologue Trailer
snippet.description:
Betrayer: Curse Of The Spine is an action/adventure Metroidvania game featuring decision making, crafting, fast-paced combat, multiple endings, intricate storytelling, an open world to explore and more.

More details here: https://worthplaying.com/game/15570-betrayer-curse-of-the-spine/

Developer TripleCh3rry and publisher Proponent Games released a massive new prologue for its upcoming metroidvania action-adventure game Betrayer: Curse of the Spine ( https://store.steampowered.com/app/1686050/Betrayer_Curse_of_the_Spine__Prologue/ ).

Betrayer: Curse of the Spine will be available through Steam Early Access soon.

#BetrayerCurseOfTheSpine #videogames #WorthPlaying #WorthPlayingvideos
